price: 72. Waxaa la odhan: Gala albaabbada Jahannama idinkoo ku waaraya, maxay ahaatay meel xun oo baas hoyga islaweynayaasha.
arabic: قِيلَ ٱدۡخُلُوٓاْ أَبۡوَٰبَ جَهَنَّمَ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَاۖ فَبِئۡسَ مَثۡوَى ٱلۡمُتَكَبِّرِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: qīla ud'khulū abwāba jahannama khālidīna fīhā fabi'sa mathwā al-mutakabirīna
